Name: XMagicMouse
About the game: Important Note XMagicMouse is NOT a live wallpaper software,it can display mouse track and effect ANYWHERE, not only on desktop wallpaper. Compatible with other software etc. Wallpaper Engine,RainWallpaper. About XMagicMouse XMagicMouse is a funny and powerful mouse effect software that displays amazing animations and effects when you move your mouse or click anywhere. Features Interactive simulation - molecules that react to the mouse movement and clicking. Workshop supported - one click download or share mouse effects. Many editing options - you can change almost every effects. Support Taskbar transparent Game Mode - will pause effects when you need 100% power for your games. Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Optimized code created for Low-end devices. Multi-Language - includes 4 languages. Compatible with other software etc. Wallpaper Engine,RainWallpaper
